feed.title: Google Cloud: Cloud TPU
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Cloud TPU

entry.content: Preview: TPU7x is available in Preview. TPU7x is the first release within the Ironwood family, Google Cloud's seventh generation TPU. TPU7x supports large-scale AI training and inference, providing performance and cost-effectiveness for demanding workloads such as large language models (LLMs), mixture of experts (MoEs), and diffusion models. For more information, see the TPU7x (Ironwood) documentation.
entry.summary: TPU7x, the latest generation of Google's Tensor Processing Units, is now available in Preview. This new hardware is designed for large-scale AI training and inference, offering improved performance and cost-efficiency for demanding AI models like LLMs and diffusion models.
entry.title: Feature: TPU7x Now in Preview
